name: Elite Stay Helper – Create Cpts and taxonomy for rooms
author: Kamaldhari Infotech

sections.description:
The Elite Stay Helper Plugin is a powerful tool designed for hotel-related websites. It provides a set of custom functionalities to enhance the management of various aspects related to hotels. Whether you’re managing rooms, showcasing nearby local gems, collecting testimonials, or promoting special offers, this plugin has got you covered.

Features

  • Custom Post Types: Register custom post types for rooms, testimonials, offers, and more.

  • Custom Taxonomy: Organize your content with a custom taxonomy tailored for hotel-related categories.

  • Custom Meta Fields: Add specific details and metadata with custom meta fields for precise information.

  • Easy Management: Simplify the management of your hotel-related content with intuitive interfaces.

Third Party Service Usage

This plugin utilizes third-party services to enhance its functionality:

Owl Carousel

The Owl Carousel library is used to create responsive and touch-enabled carousels for displaying content within this plugin. It may make requests to external domains for various purposes.

Google Maps API

The Google Maps API is used to generate and display hotel maps within this plugin. For more information about the Google Maps API and its features, please visit Google Maps API documentation.

External Domains

The Owl Carousel library and certain functionalities of this plugin may make requests to the following external domains:

  • vzaar.com: Used for fetching video data.

  • vimeo.com: Used for retrieving video information.

Legal Information

Before using this plugin, please review the terms of use and privacy policies of the third-party services mentioned above:

  • Owl Carousel Terms of Use

  • Owl Carousel Privacy Policy

  • Google Maps API Terms of Service

  • Google Privacy Policy

  • Vzaar Privacy Policy

  • Vimeo Privacy Policy

By using this plugin, you acknowledge and agree to comply with the terms of use and privacy policies of the third-party services mentioned above.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the ‘elite-stay-helper’ directory to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Where can I find documentation and support?

Please visit https://kamaldhari.com/ or contact us at pooja@kamaldhari.com.

Will this plugin work with any theme?

Yes! The Elite Stay Helper Plugin is designed to work seamlessly with any WordPress theme. However, some themes may require additional styling.

I encountered an issue. What should I do?

If you notice errors or issues, we recommend running a conflict test using Health Check or troubleshooting on a staging site. You can also report bugs or seek support on our support site.

Can I request new features?

Absolutely! We appreciate feedback. Feel free to request new features or extensions on our support site.
sections.changelog:
= 1.0.0 (2024-02-01)

  • Initial release of the Elite Stay Helper.
